message.name: ERR_FV_APPEALDECISIONDATE
message.locale: Appeal decision date must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPEALRECEIPTDATE
message.locale: A receipt date must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_FV_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: A method of receipt must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPEALDECISIONDATE_FUTURE
message.locale: The effective date must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_FV_RECEIVEDDATE_FUTURE
message.locale: The date received must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_XFV_RECEIVEDBEFOREDECISION
message.locale: The received date must not be before the registration date of the case being appealed.
